shortdef: to make a motion picture of : film

dt: {bc}a piece of transparent material (such as glass) that has two opposite regular surfaces either both curved or one curved and the other plane and that is used either singly or combined in an optical instrument for forming an image by focusing rays of light
{bc}a combination of two or more simple {a_link|lenses}
{bc}a piece of glass or plastic used (as in safety goggles or sunglasses) to protect the eye
{bc}a device for directing or focusing radiation other than light (such as sound waves, radio microwaves, or electrons)
{bc}something shaped like a biconvex optical lens
{bc}a highly transparent biconvex lens-shaped or nearly spherical body in the eye that focuses light rays (as upon the retina) {dx}see {dxt|eye|eye|illustration}{/dx}
{bc}something that facilitates and influences perception, comprehension, or evaluation

dt.t: viewing the current legal battle … through partisan {wi}lenses{/wi}

et: New Latin {it}lent-, lens{/it}, from Latin, lentil; from its shape

dt: {bc}a massive celestial object (such as a galaxy) that bends and focuses the light of another more distant object (such as a quasar) by gravity and that is usually detected by the multiple images it forms of the second object
